sourcesContent:
<template>
  <vue-winwheel
    :segments="items"
    ref="wins"
    @numeroGanador="numeroGanador"
  />
</template>

<script>
import VueWinwheel from "vue-winwheel-reversion/vue-winwheel";

export default {
  name: "sss-ss",
  components: {
    VueWinwheel,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      // pageTitle: "Vue-Wheel",
      // wheelSize: 400,
      // btnColor: "",
      // btnText: "",
      // lineWidth: 3,
      // duration: 5,
      // spin: 5,
      items: [
        {
          textFillStyle: "#fff",
          fillStyle: "#000",
          text: "Prize 1",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#000",
          fillStyle: "#fadede",
          text: "Prize 2",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#fff",
          fillStyle: "#000",
          text: "Prize 3",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#000",
          fillStyle: "#fadede",
          text: "Prize 4",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#fff",
          fillStyle: "#000",
          text: "Prize 5",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#000",
          fillStyle: "#fadede",
          text: "Prize 6",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#fff",
          fillStyle: "#000",
          text: "Prize 7",
        },
        {
          textFillStyle: "#000",
          fillStyle: "#fadede",
          text: "Prize 8",
        },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    numeroGanador(datos){
      console.log(datos)
    }
  },
  mounted(){
    
    this.$refs.wins.startSpin();

    setTimeout(() =>  {
      // this.$refs.wins.theWheel.getRandomForSegment(2)
      console.log((91 + Math.floor((Math.random() * 43))))
      this.$refs.wins.calculatePrize()
    },2000)
  }
};
</script>
